H0.text: Backbone is the feature that distinguishes vertebrates, which the lancelet lacks.

H1.text: Feet are the feature that the lancelet lacks, a feature that distinguishes vertebrates.

H2.text: Skin is the feature that the lancelet lacks, which distinguishes vertebrates.

H3.text: Mouth is the feature that the lancelet lacks, distinguishing it from vertebrates.

A4.text: They have no true complex skeleton.

A5.text: Lancelets have no respiratory system, breathing solely through their skin, which consists of a simple epithelium.
